name: Lost In Magic
description:
Zaras, the little mage, vainquished the demon lord and so could take his treasure and keep it for him, but several days later got his treasure stolen by the evil Order of Drafios, so he decided to follow the theif’s footprints with his detection spell to go after them and take it back. Arriving in the castle, he notices there isn’t anybody anywhere around him, and is forced to investigate around the area to find back his treasure. What he didn’t know was that he would need assistance in the dungeon, thankfully a mysterious voice was here to help him in his quest to get his treasure back.

Credits: Quentin Janet, Courtney Ferreira, Jules Aldea, Arnaud Benier Moine, Marc Gavanier, Pierre Camilli and Nawal Bengrich
